A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A great disappointment. 

This movie failed to deliver on both the promises that were set in the Force Awakens and to be a good movie on its own. Plot holes\, a type of humour that has no place in Star Wars films\, unnecessary plot devices\, wasted opportunities\, poorly written characters and absolutely no story development what so ever.
The movie was a cash grab for Disney as everyone will see this movie.

Let's just say the Hobbit trilogy is less of a disappointment.
